msbt.message: We're past the halfway point of the month, and I'm startin' to tingle all over with that Toy Day feeling!Maybe it's time I started thinkin' about what I might get folks, huh?Oh man! Don't be like me and think it'll all be cool if you give somethin' that ain't properly wrapped!It's been YEARS and I'm still livin' that one down

When I was a kid, I was practically feral about presents. On Toy Day, I'd wake up earlier than anyone elseAll this time, and I've still never forgotten that feeling.Though now I'm the one givin' out the gifts, which is a whole different kind of exciting, .
You seen the big tree in the plaza?! This island is decked to the halls with Toy Day spirit, !You should take some pictures before it's too late. Times like this, you'll wanna remember forever.
